Texts.Chs:
Don't be fooled by their peaceful appearance, as they shrug off damage really well! Horses also eat hay! Apparently these are reliant on special kind of hay that makes them stronger.

  ^orange;食性^reset;: Herbivore

^orange;Perks: ^reset;
  HPx^green;1.1^reset;. +^green;7^reset;% Movement & 跳跃 Height
  ^green;抗性^reset;: +^green;20^reset;% Ice, +^green;15^reset;% Poison, Physical

^orange;Environments: ^reset;
  Grassy/Wooded:  能量x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;7^reset;% 速度 & 跳跃 and +^green;10^reset;% Physical Resist
  Alien/Heck/Fleshy: Defense x^red;0.66^reset;, -^red;10^reset;% 跳跃 & 速度

^orange;Weapons: ^reset;
  Whips: +^green;5^reset;% 暴击几率, +^green;5^reset;% 速度
  Hooves: 伤害 x^green;1.15^reset;, +^green;5^reset;% 速度
  Whip & Hoof combo: +^green;10^reset;% 暴击伤害
  Broadswords: -^red;20^reset;% 速度, +^green;50^reset;% 暴击伤害
  ^red;Wand/staff^reset;: 伤害 x^red;0.01^reset;, -^red;2^reset;% 暴击几率

^orange;Weaknesses: ^reset;
  -^red;10^reset;% E. Regen. 伤害 x^red;0.92^reset;  能量x^red;0.75^reset;
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;33^reset;% Shadow, -^red;40^reset;% Radiation
Texts.Eng:
Earth Ponies, as their name indicate, are one with nature - in fact, they are adapted to life in any forested area and dedicated to gathering crops. Somehow, despite their equine build, they can wield weapons like humanoids would - with help of special saddles.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Herbivore

^orange;Perks: ^reset;:
  Health and Protection x^green;1.1^reset;. +^green;7^reset;% Movement & Jump Height
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Mud, Jungle, Clay

^orange;Environments: ^reset;:
  Grasslands or Tropics: Energy x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;7^reset;% Speed & Jump and +^green;10^reset;% Physical Resist
  Deserts: Defense x^red;0.9^reset;, Energy x^red;0.95^reset;.
  Aether Sea, Crystalline or exceedingly hot places: Damage x^red;0.8^reset, Energy x^red;0.9^reset;.

^orange;Weapons: ^reset;:
  Masteries: ^green;10^reset;% Whips, ^green;15^reset;% Hooves, ^green;5^reset;% Broadswords.

^orange;Weaknesses: ^reset;:
  Damage x^red;0.92^reset; Energy x^red;0.9^reset;

^orange;Resistances^reset;:
  -^red;20^reset;% Cosmic, -^red;10^reset;% Radiation, Fire, +^green;20^reset;% Physical, +^green;15^reset;% Poison, +^green;10^reset;% Electric
